name: hapi-locale
description: Configurable plugin for determine request language in hapi.js applications.

scripts.doc: rm -R doc; jsdoc -c jsdoc-conf.json README-JSDOC.md;    rm -f README.md;    jsdoc2md --no-gfm --src "lib/**/*" >JSDOC.md;    cat README-JSDOC.md JSDOC.md History.md LICENSE > README.md;    rm -r -f JSDOC.md;

author: Özüm Eldoğan
